Text:
Hi Skep,

Thanks for the CW.

Oops, problem with the cue file.

Oldies Guy

What's the problem oldiesguy?
It seems to be working ok here..

Hi Skep,

I used Medieval Cue Splitter, and the files are split
in the middle of each song.  

Anyone else have a problem?

O.G.

Using CueTools 2.1.2a, I extracted the separate flac tracks without a problem.
I've checked the tracks and they are complete and correct.

http://i.imgur.com/deQXe.png

Here's there download page >
http://www.cuetools.net/wiki/CUETools_Download

Sorry I can't help with 'Medieval Cue'.

Hi Skep,

Thanks for the tip.

I downloaded the file again, and Cue Splitter did
the same thing. Must be a quirk somewhere. I
fixed the files in Adobe Audition, and they sound
fine.  This is a good cd - not all loud and 
compressed.

Their you go!

LOL

Oldies Guy
